definition: To shape or mold something into a specific structure or form, typically used in the context of creating or crafting objects.

examples.german: Ich forme den Teig zu einer Kugel.
examples.english: I shape the dough into a ball.

examples.german: Sie formen die Tonmasse zu einer Vase.
examples.english: They mold the clay into a vase.

examples.german: Der Bildhauer formt die Skulptur aus Stein.
examples.english: The sculptor forms the sculpture out of stone.

examples.german: Die Wolken formen sich zu einer bedrohlichen Gestalt.
examples.english: The clouds form into a menacing shape.
